#summary Instructions on installing the plugin

= Instructions Using Wordpress =

  # Export the latest release
{{{
svn export http://gvlarp-character-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/tags/version1-8 gvlarp-character
}}}
  # Zip the folder
  # Log into the admin account on the wordpress website
  # De-activate the character plugin, if already installed
  # Delete the plugin entirely (don't worry - you aren't deleting the database tables so nothing will be lost)
  # Add New Plugin -> upload
  # Activate Plugin

= Instructions Using FTP =

  # Deactivate the plugin via Wordpress admin
  # Export the latest release
{{{
svn export http://gvlarp-character-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/tags/version1-8 gvlarp-character
}}}
  # Upload the exported files to {{{/public_html/wp-content/plugins/gvlarp-character/}}}
  # Re-activate the plugin

= After Installation =

  # Go to Characters->Configuration. Check any new options and click \[save options\] and any other save button with new options/sections
  # Go through version log and make any appropriate page content/data table/menu updates

== V1.9 to V1.10 ==

  * Check and re-save each of your cost models
  * Update the Wordpress Role for each clan
  * Configure any extra columns you want on the sign-in report
  * Configure Character Generation options
  * Set up Character Generation templates

  * Update to latest Downloads plugin, upload and set up templates

== V1.8 to V1.9 ==

  * New options in configuration to update
  * google feeding map options
  * Remove Player Admin page
  * Remove Path Upadate page/shortcode
  * Remove Change WP pages
